C

clear() - Method in class com.github.btrekkie.connectivity.ConnGraph
Clears this graph, by removing all edges and vertices, and removing all augmentation information from the vertices.
com.github.btrekkie.connectivity - package com.github.btrekkie.connectivity
 
combine(Object, Object) - Method in interface com.github.btrekkie.connectivity.Augmentation
Returns the result of combining the specified values into one.
componentHasAugmentation(ConnVertex) - Method in class com.github.btrekkie.connectivity.ConnGraph
Returns whether any of the vertices in the connected component containing the specified vertex has any associated augmentation.
connected(ConnVertex, ConnVertex) - Method in class com.github.btrekkie.connectivity.ConnGraph
Returns whether the specified vertices are connected - whether there is a path between them.
ConnGraph - Class in com.github.btrekkie.connectivity
Implements an undirected graph with dynamic connectivity.
ConnGraph() - Constructor for class com.github.btrekkie.connectivity.ConnGraph
Constructs a new ConnGraph with no augmentation.
ConnGraph(Augmentation) - Constructor for class com.github.btrekkie.connectivity.ConnGraph
Constructs an augmented ConnGraph, using the specified function to combine augmentation values.
ConnVertex - Class in com.github.btrekkie.connectivity
A vertex in a ConnGraph.
